description: This file is a shell script that manages the DHCPv6 client service, including starting, stopping, and updating DHCPv6 configurations based on system events. It sources several utility scripts and handles events related to IPv6 configuration on a network device.

methods.name: service_init
methods.description: Initializes the service by retrieving system configuration and event states.

methods.name: service_start
methods.description: Starts the DHCPv6 client if conditions are met, such as WAN link being up and mode being correct.

methods.name: service_stop
methods.description: Stops the DHCPv6 client by killing its process and removing its PID file.

methods.name: service_update
methods.description: Updates the DHCPv6 client state based on the enabled flag.

methods.name: register_dhcpv6_client_handler
methods.description: Registers event handlers for relevant system events.

methods.name: unregister_dhcpv6_client_handler
methods.description: Unregisters event handlers for system events.

methods.name: service_enable
methods.description: Enables the DHCPv6 client service and starts the daemon.

methods.name: service_disable
methods.description: Disables the DHCPv6 client service and stops the daemon.

calls: utctx_cmd get last_erouter_mode dhcpv6c_enable ipv6_static_enable lan_ipv6addr wan_ipv6addr dhcpv6c_duid lan_ifname
